## Import Nobel.csv file

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
nobel <- read_csv(file ="nobel.csv")
head(nobel)

```


## Write a csv file

```{r}

df <- tribble(
  ~x, ~y,
  1,  "a",
  2,  "b",
  3,  "c"
)

write_csv(df, "df.csv")

```


## Dealing with bad variable names 

```{r}
#edibnb_badnames <- read_csv("edibnb-badnames.csv")
# names(edibnb_badnames)

edibnb_col_names <- read_csv("edibnb-badnames.csv",
                    col_names = c("id", "price","neighbourhood", "accommodates","bathroom", "bedroom","bed",                                            "review_scores_rating", "n_reviews", "url"))

names(edibnb_col_names)

```


## Importing data with snake case variables
```{r}

edibnb_clean_names <- read_csv("edibnb-badnames.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
names(edibnb_clean_names)

```


## Read df-na csv

```{r}

read_csv("df-na.csv", 
         na = c("", "NA", ".", "9999", "Not applicable"))

```


## Reading an XLSX file

```{r}
library(readxl)
fav_food <- readxl::read_excel("favourite-food.xlsx",na = c("N/A", "99999")) %>%
janitor::clean_names()
fav_food

fav_food <- fav_food %>%
  mutate(
    age = if_else(age == "five", "5", age),
    age = as.numeric(age)
    )

fav_food

glimpse(fav_food)
```


## ETL of SES variable 

```{r}

fav_food %>%
  count(ses)

fav_food <- fav_food %>%
  mutate(ses = fct_relevel(ses, "Low", "Middle", "High"))
fav_food %>%
  count(ses)
fav_food
```


## Put it all together

```{r}
fav_food <- read_excel("favourite-food.xlsx", na = c("N/A", "99999")) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  mutate(
    age = if_else(age == "five", "5", age), 
    age = as.numeric(age),
    ses = fct_relevel(ses, "Low", "Middle", "High")
  )
fav_food


```


## Out and back in

```{r}
write_csv(fav_food, file = "fav-food-clean.csv")
fav_food_clean <- read_csv("fav-food-clean.csv")
fav_food
```
